panels.description: List of endpoints that are queried by Prometheus.
panels.title: Status of all endpoints

panels.description: Running SiteRM Versions at Site.
panels.title: Total Errors

panels.description: Running SiteRM Versions at Site.
panels.title: Running Versions

panels.description:
Probe query success, failure. 
1 - OK, Below 1 - Failure, see for more details below.
panels.title: Probe Success

panels.description: ICMP V4 Round Trip time from Prometheus hosts to SiteRM Frontend.
panels.title: ICMP round trip time (V4)

panels.description: ICMP V6 Round Trip time from Prometheus hosts to SiteRM Frontend.
panels.title: ICMP round trip time (V6)

panels.description: Left lifetime for SSL Certificate validity. It will raise an alarm once less than a week is left.
panels.title: SSL Expiry

panels.description: HTTP Connection timeline.
panels.title: HTTP Duration

panels.description: HTTP Return Code. 200 OK, Anything else - failure. In case of failure - it will alert.
panels.title: HTTP Status Code

panels.description: Individual Service Status for Site Frontend and all Agents.
panels.title: Service Status

panels.description: Individual SiteRM Thread Runtime. Only for debugging purposes of stuck processes.
panels.title: SiteRM Threads Runtime

panels.description: SiteRM LookUpService status over time. No data - Service runs normally. 1 - Service has failed for some reason. If failure - it will alert.
panels.title: SiteRM LookUpService Not OK Status

panels.description: SiteRM ProvisioningService status over time. No data - Service runs normally. 1 - Service has failed for some reason. If failure - it will alert.
panels.title: SiteRM ProvisioningService Not OK Status

panels.description: SiteRM SNMPMonitoring status over time. No data - Service runs normally. 1 - Service has failed for some reason. It will not alert as SNMP is not mandatory.
panels.title: SiteRM SNMPMonitoring Not OK Status

panels.description: All SiteRM Agents' status over time. No data - Service runs normally. 1 - Service has failed for some reason. If failure - it will alert.
panels.title: SiteRM Agent Not OK Status

panels.description: All SiteRM Debugger's status over time. No data - Service runs normally. 1 - Service has failed for some reason. If failure - it will alert.
panels.title: SiteRM Debugger Not OK Status

panels.description: All SiteRM Rulers' status over time. No data - Service runs normally. 1 - Service has failed for some reason. If failure - it will alert.
panels.title: SiteRM Ruler Not OK Status

panels.description: All SiteRM Component's statuses are grouped by hostname and service state (only Running correctly) over time. 1 - service runs normally. Below 1 - Service has failed for some reason. If failure - it will alert.
panels.title: SiteRM Component Status

panels.description: All SiteRM Component's statuses are grouped by hostname and service state over time. 1+OK - service runs normally. Below 1 or not OK - Service has failed for some reason.
panels.title: SiteRM Component Status (NOT OK)

panels.description: SiteRM Frontend Memory statistics for all processes. Only for debugging purposes.
panels.title: SiteRM FE Thread Memory Monitoring (VMS)

panels.description: SiteRM Frontend Memory statistics for all processes. Only for debugging purposes.
panels.title: SiteRM FE Thread Memory Monitoring (RSS)

panels.description: Checks if Prometheus is able to receive monitoring data for this specific Site DTNs. 1 means OK, 0 means failure.
panels.title: Able to receive monitoring data from DTNs
Network Status VSW (Not activated for T3_FABRIC_NEWY)
Network Status VSW (Not activated for T3_FABRIC_NEWY)

targets.expr: sum(irate(interfaces_rx_miss{sitename="T3_FABRIC_NEWY", software="VPP"}[2m])) without (thread, index) * 100 / sum(irate(interfaces_rx_packets{sitename="T3_FABRIC_NEWY", software="VPP"}[2m]) > 0) without (thread, index)

sum(irate(interfaces_tx_error{sitename="T3_FABRIC_NEWY", software="VPP"}[2m])) without (thread, index) / sum(irate(interfaces_tx_packets{sitename="T3_FABRIC_NEWY", software="VPP"}[2m]) > 0) without (thread, index)

message: Script changes made on 2025-05-16. See git for changes
